pci.description: Physical Cell ID. Range 0 to 503. Equal to ORS Serial number modulo 504 by default

lte_band.title: LTE band
lte_band.description: LTE band number. Default depends on ORS model, please refer to the connection parameters

dl_frequency.title: DL Frequency
dl_frequency.description: Downlink center frequency of the cell. Default depends on your ORS model, please refer to the connection parameters. Make sure to not set a value outside the range of your ORS

dl_earfcn.title: Expert: DL EARFCN
dl_earfcn.description: Can be used instead of DL Frequency to directly set the Downlink E-UTRA Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell (Do not set both DL Frequency and DL EARFCN)

root_sequence_index.description: Range: 0 to 137. Equal to ORS serial number modulo 138 by default. Sets PRACH root sequence index (SIB2.rootSequenceIndex field). It must be different for each neighbour cell operating on the same frequency and sharing the same PRACH configuration.
